Kim Yong Nam and his party back home
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop meets delegation of Koreans in Japan 
    Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met the delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by Kwon Sun Hwi, vice-chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, on a visit to the socialist homeland and conversed with it in an atmosphere overflowing with compatriotic feelings at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
